component.name: SFC30
component.summary: Firmware for the 8Bitdo SFC30 Game Controller

description.p: Updating the firmware on your SFC30 device improves performance and adds new features.
This stable release adds the following feature:

ul.li: Joystick Mode (hold START button power on) support for OSX

description.p: This stable release also fixes the following issues:

ul.li: Improve the connection with the Retro Receiver NES
Make the LED blink much quicker when the in auto-connect status

screenshot.caption: Unplug the controller, hold down L+R+START for 3 seconds until both LEDs are flashing then reconnect the controller.
